nodes.excerpt: NoCodeZ creates web, IOS and Android apps using the power of AI. You write a business story. You answer questions about what you see in the app and how the app should work. Our AI automagically builds the apps for you with complete infrastructure.
nodes.title: NoCodeZ 2.0 - Next generation no-code, build enterprise apps using AI

nodes.excerpt: Convert articles, summaries or newsletters into high quality audio readthroughs tailored for memory and helping you get what you need to know faster.

nodes.author: Yehoshua Zlotogorski

nodes.excerpt: We leverage AI (with a human touch) to generate product ideas based on your interests, skills, and past projects.
nodes.title: Product Ideas On-Demand - Get ideas that match your interests, skills and projects
nodes.author: Jakob Greenfeld

nodes.excerpt: I love generating ideas with GPT-3 and I had an idea to feed it with products created by the top (and my favorite) makers and then I told it to predict what their next projects will be. I thought the results were interesting!
nodes.title: Product Prediction - I asked GPT-3 to guess what the top makers will build next
nodes.author: joseph

nodes.excerpt: A no-code machine learning platform built to unleash the power of computer vision and automation. It's a smart, scalable, cost-effective ML API as a service platform that trains and integrates state-of-the-art machine learning and deep learning.
nodes.title: DeepLobe - Your no-code machine learning platform
nodes.author: Ramesh Damma

nodes.excerpt: Hello Product hunters, Stop comparing smartphones manually. Use TechSpecs AI technology to automatically compare and find the best smartphone.
nodes.title: TechSpecs VS - AI that automatically compares smartphones for you

nodes.title: Image to Cartoon - Best AI cartoonizer online for free

nodes.excerpt: Make your presentations or screen recordings more engaging by showing yourself on your desktop. Record a YouTube video, remove background from camera footage without requiring a green screen. Keep focus on your face just like iPad's centre stage, but on Mac.
nodes.title: Presentation Camera - Live video on your Mac

nodes.excerpt: AVDA is a mobile app that simplifies job placements by translating resumes into easy to comprehend data that can be filtered and searched while giving the user a modern day dating like experience all while helping to decrease downtime and save company's money.

nodes.title: Slidekick - AI-powered slide deck builder, powered by GPT-3

nodes.excerpt: IRIS Clarity is a desktop app that uses voice isolation AI to remove those distracting background noises that often creep in. Real-time and multi-directional, Clarity allows all participants to immediately enjoy clearer sound, no matter where they are.
